title: Appointment Setter (Sales)
job_overview:
We're seeking a highly efficient and results-driven Virtual Appointment Setter who excels in a fast-paced, high-volume calling environment. You must have proven solar sales experience, strong communication skills, and the ability to support admin tasks with precision.

 Key Responsibilities
• Make 50-100+ outbound calls per day to warm/cold leads in the solar industry.
• Set and confirm qualified appointments for the sales team
• Manage and update calendars and CRM tools
• Conduct SMS/email follow-ups
• Provide admin support, including email management, data entry, and task tracking.
• Report daily performance metrics
 Requirements
• Experience as a successful appointment setter in solar or similar high-ticket industry
• Comfortable with high call volumes and handling rejection professionally
• Clear, fluent English (spoken and written)
• Strong phone presence with the ability to build rapport quickly
• Familiarity with High-level, HubSpot, or similar CRMs
• Knowledge of Google Suite, Zoom, Calendly, and similar tools
• Quiet home office + reliable high-speed internet
• Must be available during US business hours (PST)
Bonus Points For:
• Background in sales and lead generation
• Proven track record of setting appointments that convert
• Prior VA experience supporting multiple roles or industries
• Organized and self-driven with strong time management
What You’ll Get:
• Long-term, stable work with a growing agency
• Weekly pay + performance-based bonuses 
• Opportunities for advancement
• Supportive and motivating team culture
???? How to Apply:
Send a message with the subject line: “Solar Setter Pro – [Your Name]” and include:
• Resume
• 1-2 minute video intro (mention your solar or sales experience + comfort with high-volume calls)
• Tools/software you’ve used
• Internet speed test (speedtest.net)
• Availability (PST hours)
???? We’re looking for someone serious about making an impact. If you're hungry, sharp, and consistent — apply now!
